title: Manager responds to community concerns about operations
description: Manager responds to community concerns about operations
content:
Scenario: Manager responds to community concerns about operations
    Given community member complains about noise from early morning deliveries
    And legitimate community concern requires operational adjustment
    When Marcus receives the complaint
    Then Marcus investigates the noise issue objectively
    And Marcus proposes delivery schedule modification to worker council
    And workers deliberate balancing operational needs with community impact
    And workers vote on delivery schedule change
    And Marcus implements worker decision and communicates to community
    And community_elohim facilitates community-worker dialogue
